name: Ravens and the Forbidden Lands
description:
Ravens and the Forbidden Lands is a dynamic game where your main objective is to stay alive while the camera moves in a single direction, until you manage to find a door in a wooden log. enemies, obstacles and even traps will try to stop you from reaching the door, your only way to defend yourself are magic staves which are your main weapon in the game.

Ravens and the Forbidden Lands is still in development, this is a beta version that I want to improve and add even more content like different stages and ways to progress in the game.

You can leave your feedback about the game, any criticism or something to improve, I will read each comment very carefully. thanks for your attention and have fun!!

CONTROLS:

  • to control the menu, just use the arrow keys and the ENTER button to confirm
  • The character moves through the WASD keys and attacks with the LEFT MOUSE BUTTON. He also drops bombs using RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON and using E button to interact and pick up items (this information can be changed in the CONTROLS menu).

IMPORTANT:  game may have some bugs/problems, please, whenever you can, report the problem in the tabs below the comments
